channel.title: Calling in the best of the best
channel.description:
Need some talented web developers who know what they are doing. Looking for someone who is experienced with php, css and html. You will be paid a percentage of the profits of the website the entire time you are with us.
It does have something to do with runescape. (No not a pserver)

item.title: Calling in the best of the best
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.source: Calling in the best of the best

item.title: Calling in the best of the best
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

[quote=“chri5, post:16, topic:406605”]they host a dedi with rsbots.net bot to automate trade with client side php sending auth verification dur[/quote]wat

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:17, topic:406605”][quote author=mutex_ link=topic=503604.msg3686110#msg3686110 date=1311858863]

Meh I guess ill spit it out…

gpcasino… takes the rs gp from your account and you gamble your rs gp online in poker rooms and such. (something like that )
[/quote]But there’s no way to directly verify a trade, so how would you validate that people get paid?

They can cashout and take cash or they can take rsgp. If in game trade is required the proper precautions will be arranged and videos will be made.[/quote]So basically some sort of trading system (MySQL-based) which is behind a login encompassing on RuneScape usernames? It’s definitely possible, but the demand for secure transactions of GP in RuneScape holds a strong con towards the idea.

Read full topic
item.source: Calling in the best of the best

item.title: Calling in the best of the best
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote=“mutex_, post:15, topic:406605”][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=503604.msg3686076#msg3686076 date=1311855793]
Meh I guess ill spit it out…

gpcasino… takes the rs gp from your account and you gamble your rs gp online in poker rooms and such. (something like that )
[/quote]But there’s no way to directly verify a trade, so how would you validate that people get paid?[/quote]

They can cashout and take cash or they can take rsgp. If in game trade is required the proper precautions will be arranged and videos will be made.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:6, topic:406605”][quote author=chri5 link=topic=503604.msg3684628#msg3684628 date=1311770931]

you rang?

have fun getting $0.05 a month in ad revenue
[/quote]
You can use other languages (not preferred) but it most be able to integrate with a java applet and mysql.[/quote]I am pretty sure every single language that isnt PHP handles both of those 500 times better.

item.title: Calling in the best of the best
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote=“chri5, post:4, topic:406605”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=503604.msg3684519#msg3684519 date=1311762395]
you rang?
[/quote]

have fun getting $0.05 a month in ad revenue[/quote]

Up to 50% of the profit. Could be $100 it could be $500. Depends on the business. The plan is to make money every second which the full plan will be presented to the developer after acceptance. Don’t want anyone running away with epic ideas.

You can use other languages (not preferred) but it most be able to integrate with a java applet and mysql.

Read full topic
